Dr. Will Barker (威廉 巴克尔) | theoretical physics, cosmology

  • Dr. Will E. V. Barker
  • wb263@cam.ac.uk
  • wevbarker
  • Blo\(g_{\mu\nu}\)

This site is for theoretical, high-energy and gravitational physics and cosmology (broadly defined). More specific topics might include differential geometry, geometric algebra, gauge theories of gravity. Blog-Mu-Nu is a blog which reviews interesting arXiv preprints from [gr-qc], [hep-th] and [astro-ph].
